herbs.keyActions: Gold: Calm spirit, clear heat, settle convulsions

herbs.name: Ling Yang Jiao
herbs.keyActions: extinguishes wind, calms liver, clears heat from PC/HT/LIV (delirium/manic behavior), use Shan Yang Jiao (goat horn) + Gou Teng instead

herbs.name: Shi Jun Zi
herbs.keyActions: kills roundworms, pinworms, tonifies SP, treats childhood malnutrition

herbs.name: Bing Lang
herbs.keyActions: kills tapeworm/pinworm/roundworm/blood flukes, excellent MJ qi regulator, promotes bowel movement/urination, unblocks leg edema

herbs.name: Guan Zhong
herbs.keyActions: kills tapeworm/roundworm/hookworm/liver fluke, clears heat/toxin, cools blood, rarely used due to toxicity but POWERFUL

herbs.name: He Shi
herbs.keyActions: kills roundworms/pinworms/hookworms/tapeworms

herbs.name: Ku Lian Pi
herbs.keyActions: Eliminate parasites, relieve itching, treat tinea

herbs.name: Wu Yi
herbs.keyActions: Kills parasites, topical for tinea infection

herbs.name: Guan Zhong
herbs.keyActions: Expels parasites, clears heat and toxicity, cools the blood, resolves epidemic toxicity

herbs.name: Chang Shan
herbs.keyActions: Expels parasites and treats malaria, induces sweating

herbs.name: Lei Wan
herbs.keyActions: Expels parasites (especially roundworms), relieves food stagnation

herbs.name: Fei Zi
herbs.keyActions: Expels parasites (especially roundworms), moistens intestines to relieve constipation, stops cough

herbs.name: She Chuang Zi
herbs.keyActions: kills parasites, stops itch, works as yang tonic to dispel cold, most clinical use is genital itching (w/ bian xu)

herbs.name: Ming Fan
herbs.keyActions: relieves fire toxin, generates flesh, stops bleeding, clears heat, expels phlegm

herbs.name: Lu Gan Shi
herbs.keyActions: sedates liver fire rising, dries damp, generates flesh, stops itch, heals sores/boils/ulcers/wounds

herbs.name: Liu Huang
herbs.keyActions: topical mainly: stops itch, soothes skin, tonifies yang, laxative

herbs.name: Chan Su
herbs.keyActions: relieves toxicity, mostly used for sore throat, toxic (may be banned)

herbs.name: Er Cha
herbs.keyActions: Stops bleeding, astringes, generates flesh, reduces swelling

herbs.name: Zao Fan
herbs.keyActions: Resolve toxicity, kill parasites, treat skin disorders

herbs.name: Tu Jing Pi
herbs.keyActions: Clear heat, resolve toxicity, kill parasites, relieve itching

herbs.name: Da Feng Zi
herbs.keyActions: Resolves toxicity, expels wind, treats chronic skin conditions, especially leprosy

herbs.name: Lu Feng Fang
herbs.keyActions: Expels wind, relieves pain, resolves toxicity, dispels phlegm, stops itching, treats tumors, treats parasites

herbs.name: Ban Mao
herbs.keyActions: Chinese blister beetle: Breaks up accumulation, resolves toxicity, eliminates carbuncles, removes phlegm and opens channels

herbs.name: Ying Su Ke
herbs.keyActions: opium husk: Astringe Lung, stop cough, bind intestines, control pain

herbs.name: Xiong Huang
herbs.keyActions: obsolete/toxic, kills parasites, relieves toxicity, expels phlegm, settles wind, stops malarial orders

herbs.name: Qing Fen
herbs.keyActions: obsolete/toxic, kills parasites, generates flesh, promotes healing, expels water, unblocks the bowels and bladder

herbs.name: Zhu Sha
herbs.keyActions: obsolete: cools fire, sedates heart, calms shen, expels phlegm, relieves toxins (sores/boils/sore throat)

herbs.name: Ma Dou Ling
herbs.keyActions: toxic: Clears the Lung, transforms phlegm, stops cough and wheezing, drains heat, and relieves swelling and pain

herbs.name: Qian Dan
herbs.keyActions: lead tetroxide: expels toxin, generates flesh, resolves phlegm, use with great caution internally

herbs.name: Sheng Tie Luo
herbs.keyActions: iron filings: Calm spirit, anchor yang, settle fright (historical use)

herbs.name: Dai Mao
herbs.keyActions: Endangered turtle: Clear heat, open orifices, calm the spirit, relieve toxicity

herbs.name: Guang Fang Ji
herbs.keyActions: Toxic: expel wind-dampness, relieve pain, promote urination, reduce edema

herbs.name: Hu Gu
herbs.keyActions: tiger bone, endangered; Strengthen bones and sinews, relieve pain, dispel wind-damp, support yang, address deficiency

herbs.name: Ma Qian Zi
herbs.keyActions: Contains strychnine: Unblocks channels and collaterals, reduces swelling, alleviates pain, resolves toxicity

herbs.name: Peng Sha
herbs.keyActions: Clears heat, resolves toxicity, reduces swelling, especially for oral and throat disorders; used topically
